name: Woodland Deer Horn Pendant Assemblage, Tibet, Turquoise, Jet
description:
A mixed media assemblage of a hand crafted deer horn pendant decorated with Tibetan chank shells, large crinoid fossils, Nacozari Big Sky turquoise, and Jet.  Suspended on round leather cord in the World Traveler Style; leather tied with sliding knots to adjust the length.  The deer antler has been shaped and sealed, topped on one side with a natural holey stone and super special fossils.  This necklace is full of Mojo.  Not for the faint of heart. Copper chains hang from one side, suspending the earthly elements of turquoise, fossil and shell.  Total length of the leather cord is about 26 inches, 13 inches on each side of the 3 inch long well balanced pendant.  With the sliding knots, it can be adjusted to a much shorter length.  This is one of my one of a kind necklaces made with found objects.  Never to be repeated.  Be ready for lots of interest when you wear this piece.
Attractively gift boxed and ships priority.

name: Meditation Wheel, Spirit Wheel, Little She Bear Ursula
description:
Hoop Beaded and encased in long brown fur, a bumpy, hand lamp worked glass bead sits in the middle of a box woven sinew web.  Carved agate leaves and Kashgar garnets suspend from beaded strings finished with small brass bells.  
This spirit wheel celebrates the wild beauty of the little she bear, Ursula.
Bears are apex predators.  There only known enemy, is the tiger.  Bears are known to circle around back to track those who are hunting them.
This finished wall decor' is six inches in diameter, with another 3 inches of fur trim.
Packaged with care and sent priority mail.

name: Fossil Skyscrapers, Stone City Spiders, Miniature World, Crinoid Fossil Columns
description:
This crinoid fossil assemblage is made with tumbled crinoid columns and tiny wire spiders on a raft salvaged from an antique wagon wheel. A miniature cityscape  sculpture resting on four felt pads.  

Fairy money, Indian money, sea lilies, are all names for the Crinoid Fossil.  A forgotten ancestor of the starfish family.  Columns are accented with TN Blue Slag pieces.  The entire city is covered in Ice, thereby preserving it for eternity. A one of a kind art piece, sure to stir interest and conversation.

Mixed media assemblage is  6 1/2 inches long, 3 inches wide, stone columns 1 inch high and 1/2 inch at the widest.
This piece will be carefully packaged and sent Priority Mail.

name: Alternative Metal, Hand Carved Solid Aluminum Pendant
description:
High grade Aluminum is THE alternative metal.  This oval locket shaped pendant has been hand carved from a single chunk of professional grade aluminum. People will be asking you about it when you wear it.  Pendant is highly polished, has weight, and will not tarnish like sterling silver.  Note the loop on top is part of the whole pendant. 
Suspended on 18 inches of black 3mm Greek cord, finished with sterling silver end caps and spring ring clasp.
*Pendant size 1 1/4 inches long
A classic design, an unusual material, sure to create lots of interest.
Attractively gift boxed and ships first class.
*Pendant width 7/8 inches
*Pendant thickness 1/4 inch

name: African Baule Discs Vonsen Blue Jade Earrings
description:
California Blue Jade beads dangle from very old brass African Baule discs.  Niobium ear wires for those with sensitive ear lobes. 
These beauties drop about 1 1/2 inches. Substantial Vintage brass discs are 3/4 inch diameter, yet lightweight enough for great one of a kind dangly earrings.  
Delicate, gold filled headpins capture the highly polished Vonsen blue jade stones. 
Earrings are pleasingly gift boxed and ship first class.
